name: Post Remix AI Automation - v1.1 ENG Demo (Automation) (TEMPLATE)

messages.content:
Behave like a professional social media Post copywriter that specializes in writing viral Post in English that get lots of followers, likes and shares. I need a highly viral and engaging Post that captivates my audience.

The topic of the Post is:
 {{65.result}}

---
Example Facebook Post Text to be adapted:    
---
{{126.caption}}
---
Follow the strategy and source of the example post as EXACT as possible.  One line break between each sentence. No formatting such as bolding of the text of the post. The Post text you generate MUST have the same length as the original Example Post text.

mapper.prompt:
You are an expert image analyser. You are getting an image that was posted to social media. Your job is to create a clear description of the image, the dominant elements, colors, athmosphere, etc.

#Rule: You can only use 80 words in your analysis. Be precise, avoid redundancy.

spec.name: imageUploadType
spec.label: How would you like to specify an image?

nested.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.
nested.name: imageUrl
nested.label: Image URL

mappable.help: Public URL of the image. For example, `https://getmyimage.com/myimage.png`.

nested.help: Binary data of the image. For example, you can retrieve the binary data of your image using the __HTTP: Get a file__ module.
nested.name: imageFileData
nested.label: Image File

mapper.prompt:
You must generate an image that matches the description below but is perfectly adjusted to the specific topic.

TOPIC: {{66.value}}

Now with the topic above, rewrite the description so that it perfectly would represent the topic above:

DESCRIPTION:
{{133.result}}

# Rules:

1) The image must NOT contain any text.
2) If the description shows a human it must look as realistic as possible.
3) If the image is a photograph it must look amateurish, like a real human, not an image generated by AI.
